description:
The Martin Lamp is the first of its kind to appear on Opendesk. Designed by [00 Architect](http://www.architecture00.net/) [Lynton Pepper](/designers/lynton-pepper), the lamp is ultra-lightweight and can easily be added to a breakout area to present a calm zonal space. Being very lightweight it’s suited to having its back to a wall or in-between [seating](/categories/seating). Made out of our standard 18mm ply the cable and bulb are left to you to customise. In the images we’ve used a smooth red fabric lighting cable with a traditional Edison squirrel cage 60w bulb. _Note: Makers might require a minimum order or fit with other designs such as [Edie](/edie/edie-table), [Desk Tidy](/fin/desk-tidy), [Johann Stool](/nouvelle-fabrique/johann-stool)._ ## How to buy
#### [Managing it Yourself? Get quotes from a local maker »]() To get a price you can connect to a [maker near you.](https://www.opendesk.cc/open/makers) With this design most makers will need an order of larger than one to avoid material wastage so before you request a quote increase the quantity or see if there are any other designs you can bundle together. On many occasions the unit price can come down with a bulk order! #### [Find out more about how it works »](https://www.opendesk.cc/designs/how-it-works) _PLEASE NOTE: Pricing varies based on your location and local maker capacity._
name: Martin Lamp
